questions.question: The total profits for this monopolist are identified by
questions.explanation: Profit is (Price − ATC) × Quantity. Based on the described graph, price is at point K (A), ATC at point J (B), quantity at X₁, forming rectangle ABJK.

scoreMessages.90: Correctly identified profit area from graph.
scoreMessages.50: Needs review of monopoly profit graphical representation.
scoreMessages.0: Review how to find profit on a monopoly graph: (P − ATC) × Q.
